nl.esciencecenter.esight.scenegraph

Class OctreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.scenegraph.OctreeNode

  • public class OctreeNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Node for an Octree datastructure. Think of a cube in space in which you feed elements with a location. When the cube overflows with elements, it subdivides into 8 children Octreenodes. The Octree can be drawn directly. ATTENTION: After adding elements, the finalize() function should be called to clean up and prepare for drawing. The init() function should also be called before drawing.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Detail

      • OctreeNode

        public OctreeNode(Model baseModel,
          int maxElements,
          int depth,
          VecF3 corner,
          float ribSize)
        Basic constructor for OctreeNode
        Parameters:
        baseModel - The model to use for graphic representations of this node.
        maxElements - The maximum amount of OctreeElements for this node.
        depth - The depth for this node in the octree (root = 0).
        corner - The corner location for the lower X, Y, Z values of the cube represented by this node.
        ribSize - The rib sizes for the cube represented by this node.

      • OctreeNode

        public OctreeNode(OctreeNode other)
        Copy constructor for OctreeNode
        Parameters:
        other - the node to copy.

      • init

        public void init(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
        OpenGL initialization method.
        Parameters:
        gl - the currently bound GL instance.

      • delete

        public void delete(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
        Deletion method for this octree node. Cleans up any used memory. Since only one model is used, this needs to delete only once.
        Parameters:
        gl - the currently bound GL instance.

      • addElement

        public void addElement(OctreeElement element)
        Add an element to this node.
        Parameters:
        element - The OctreeElement to add to this node.

      • finalizeAdding

        public void finalizeAdding()
        Finalize the addition of new elements to this node. Calculate things we have to calculate for drawing (f.e. color), and clear datastructures. ATTENTION: This is a placeholder, and currently sets the color to transparent white based on population density compared to maxElements. Override this.

      • addElementSubdivided

        public void addElementSubdivided(OctreeElement element)
        Add an element to the proper child.
        Parameters:
        element - The element to add.

      • draw

        public void draw(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl,
        ShaderProgram program,
        MatF4 MVMatrix)
          throws UninitializedException
        OpenGL draw method.
        Parameters:
        gl - the current GL instance.
        program - The ShaderProgram to use in the drawing process.
        MVMatrix - The global Modelview Matrix.
        Throws:
        UninitializedException - if this method was called before calling the init(GL3) method.
